SkillTracker ğŸ¯

SkillTracker is a web-based application developed as a BCA 6th Semester Project.
It helps users track, manage, and improve their skills by recording progress in a simple and organized way.

ğŸ“Œ Project Purpose

The main goal of SkillTracker is to:

Help users keep track of their skills

Provide role-based access (Admin & User)

Practice full-stack development using Flask and MySQL

Understand authentication, authorization, and database design

ğŸ› ï¸ Technologies Used

Backend: Python (Flask)

Frontend: HTML, CSS

Database: MySQL (phpMyAdmin)

Server: Flask Development Server

Tools: VS Code, Git, GitHub

âš™ï¸ How to Run the Project Locally

Clone the repository

Create and activate a virtual environment

Install dependencies from requirements.txt

Create the MySQL database SkillTracker

Configure database connection in the project

Run the Flask app

Open browser and go to:

http://127.0.0.1:5000
